reviews.text:
STAY AWAY! I don‚Äôt know of it‚Äôs something against tourists in particular or just general disdain but when we sat down we waited 30 minutes for someone to take our food order (after ignored 5 times with a place that wasn‚Äôt even busy to begin with and having to flash my phone LANTERN light to get a waiter to come) just to be told that they were only serving pizza. When I said I wanted a salad like the gentleman from the table behind me they said it wasn‚Äôt possible. Photo of said salad which I took after asking the man for permission. RUDE, UNPROFESSIONAL & TERRIBLE! Stay away

PS- staff buying SHOTS for those next to us to write a nice review (5 or 6 people at the table) is just CRINGE ü§£

Cool atmosphere and decorations, very unique retro industrial style. The food was excellent and the staff very nice and pleasant. The waiting time can be a little long when crowded. Nice vintage stores on location. Will be back.

This night they organized a "knowledge" contest on display and speakers, the volume of the useless presenter is extremely high, covering any conversation attempt. The service is a record in slowness. The food is good.

We went there for a Suie Paparude live concert, spent some time on the terrace. Everything went fine, food was good while beer has a very affordable price. :) Is not the fanciest place in town, it's an honest pub where you can have a decent meal and an affordable drink together with your friends.

The terrace is nice , the club not quite. I went up to the entrance and got immediately turned around because they don‚Äôt allow ‚Äúemos‚Äù in. When I asked ‚Äúexcuse me what?!‚Äù He already asked the other bouncer to pull me away from the queue. If you have a dress code just say so. Just because I had piercings and black eyeliner I was immediately insulted. As a techno dj and event organiser that lived in London for over 11 years, you clearly don‚Äôt know how to do your job properly. Rude, aggressive and disrespectful. Learn basic manners nu versurile lu salam in cascuta.
